Description:
Detects launch of the PSEXESVC service, which means that this system was the target of a psexec remote execution

Author: Thomas Patzke, Romaissa Adjailia, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PsExec Service Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path = 'c:\windows\psexesvc.exe' and original_file_name = 'psexesvc.exe'
